sentences.sContent: The doctors gave him a one in ten chance of survival .
sentences.sCn: 医生说他有十分之一的生存希望。

sentences.sContent: The cult is a survival from the old Zoroastrian religion.
sentences.sCn: 这种膜拜仪式是古老的拜火教遗留下来的。

sentences.sContent: ...especially if it can't calculate survival odds...
...Another challenge to language survival is television...
...they may have acquired a certain standing as well as a sense of pride in their survival skills...
...But for the survival instinct which nearly all creatures have...
...How does global warming affect the survival of turtles...
...What constitutes a major threat to the survival of turtles according to Elizabeth Griffin...
...Nature is quite fair regarding the survival of turtles...

synos.tran: 幸存，残存；幸存者，残存物

phrases.pCn: 生存价值；生存值；存活值

words.tran: 继续存在的；未死的；依然健在的
活命主义者；成功地活下来的人
幸存；生还；幸免于；比...活得长

trans.tranOther: the state of continuing to live or exist
